channel.description: Managing the Boot Process Managing the boot process with Ansible is a bit disappointing because Ansible offers no specific modules to do so. As a result, you must use generic modules instead, like the file module to manage the systemd boot targets or the lineinfile module to manage the GRUB configuration. What Ansible does offer, however, is the reboot module, which enables you to reboot a host and pick up after the reboot at the exact same location. The next two sections describe how to do this.
